video:video.video:description: Gaming and education is a broad title. In this episode of the Game Dev Show, whether or not you're an educator, gamer, or just want to teach people your skills, this video will have content for you! &#8230;

video:video.video:description: Welcome back for another episode of the Game Dev Show. In this episode, Adam Tuliper takes you on a tour of PlayMaker, a visual FSM (Finite State Machine) tool for creating logic in your Unity games.&#8230;
